name: Ceasefire
text: After the **rainbow** player activates a system that contains 1 or more of your units: The **rainbow** player cannot move units to the active system. Then return this card to the **rainbow** player.

name: Political Secret
text: When an agenda is revealed: The **rainbow** player cannot vote, play action cards, or use faction abilities until after that agenda has been resolved. Then, return this card to the **rainbow** player.

name: Support for the Throne
text: When you receive this card, if you are not the **rainbow** player, you must place it faceup in your play area and gain 1 victory point. When you activate a system that contains 1 or more of the **rainbow** player's units, or if the **rainbow** player is eliminated, lose 1 victory point and return this card to the **rainbow** player.

name: Trade Agreement
text: When the **rainbow** player replenishes commodities: The **rainbow** player gives you all of their commodities. Then, return this card to the **rainbow** player.

name: Alliance
text: When you receive this card, if you are not the **rainbow** player, you must place it faceup in your play area. While this card is in your play area, you can use the **rainbow** player's commander ability, if it is unlocked. When you activate a system that contains 1 or more of the **rainbow** player's units, return this card to the **rainbow** player.

text: When you receive this card, if you are not the **gray** player, you must place it faceup in your play area. While this card is in your play area, you can use the **gray** player's commander ability, if it is unlocked. When you activate a system that contains 1 or more of the **gray** player's units, return this card to the **gray** player.

name: Ceasefire
text: After the **red** player activates a system that contains 1 or more of your units: The **red** player cannot move units to the active system. Then return this card to the **red** player.

name: Political Secret
text: When an agenda is revealed: The **red** player cannot vote, play action cards, or use faction abilities until after that agenda has been resolved. Then, return this card to the **red** player.

name: Support for the Throne
text: When you receive this card, if you are not the **red** player, you must place it faceup in your play area and gain 1 victory point. When you activate a system that contains 1 or more of the **red** player's units, or if the **red** player is eliminated, lose 1 victory point and return this card to the **red** player.

name: Trade Agreement
text: When the **red** player replenishes commodities: The **red** player gives you all of their commodities. Then, return this card to the **red** player.

name: Alliance
text: When you receive this card, if you are not the **red** player, you must place it faceup in your play area. While this card is in your play area, you can use the **red** player's commander ability, if it is unlocked. When you activate a system that contains 1 or more of the **red** player's units, return this card to the **red** player.

name: Political Secret
text: When an agenda is revealed: The **yellow** player cannot vote, play action cards, or use faction abilities until after that agenda has been resolved. Then, return this card to the **yellow** player.

When you activate a system that contains 1 or more of the **yellow** player's units, or if the **yellow** player is eliminated, lose 1 victory point and return this card to the **yellow** player.

text: When the **yellow** player replenishes commodities: The **yellow** player gives you all of their commodities. Then, return this card to the **yellow** player.

When you activate a system that contains 1 or more of the **black** player's units, or if the **black** player is eliminated, lose 1 victory point and return this card to the **black** player.

text: When the **black** player replenishes commodities: The **black** player gives you all of their commodities. Then, return this card to the **black** player.

text: When you receive this card, if you are not the **black** player, you must place it faceup in your play area. While this card is in your play area, you can use the **black** player's commander ability, if it is unlocked. When you activate a system that contains 1 or more of the **black** player's units, return this card to the **black** player.

name: Ceasefire
text: After the **orange** player activates a system that contains 1 or more of your units: The **orange** player cannot move units to the active system. Then return this card to the **orange** player.

name: Political Secret
text: When an agenda is revealed: The **orange** player cannot vote, play action cards, or use faction abilities until after that agenda has been resolved. Then, return this card to the **orange** player.

name: Support for the Throne
text: When you receive this card, if you are not the **orange** player, you must place it faceup in your play area and gain 1 victory point. When you activate a system that contains 1 or more of the **orange** player's units, or if the **orange** player is eliminated, lose 1 victory point and return this card to the **orange** player.

name: Trade Agreement
text: When the **orange** player replenishes commodities: The **orange** player gives you all of their commodities. Then, return this card to the **orange** player.

name: Alliance
text: When you receive this card, if you are not the **orange** player, you must place it faceup in your play area. While this card is in your play area, you can use the **orange** player's commander ability, if it is unlocked. When you activate a system that contains 1 or more of the **orange** player's units, return this card to the **orange** player.

name: Strike Wing Ambuscade
text: When 1 or more of your units make a roll for a unit ability: Choose 1 of those units to roll 1 additional die. Then, return this card to the Argent player.

name: War Funding
text: After you and your opponent roll dice during space combat: You may reroll all of your opponent's dice. You may reroll any number of your dice. Then, return this card to the Letnev player.

name: Raghs Call
text: After you commit 1 or more units to land on a planet: Remove all of the Saar player's ground forces from that planet and place them on a planet controlled by the Saar player. Then, return this card to the Saar player.

name: Fires of the Gashlai
text: Action: Remove 1 token from the Muaat player's fleet pool and return it to their reinforcements. Then, gain your war sun unit upgrade technology card.  Then, return this card to the Muaat Player.

name: Trade Convoys
text: Action: Place this card faceup in your play area. While this card is in your play area, you may negotiate transactions with players who are not your neighbor.  If you activate a system that contains 1 or more of the Hacan player's units, return this card to the Hacan player.

name: Blood Pact
text: Action: Place this card faceup in your play area. When you and the Empyrean player cast votes for the same outcome, cast 4 additional votes for that outcome. If you activate a system that contains 1 or more of the Empyrean player's units, return this card to the Empyrean player.

name: Military Support
text: At the start of the Sol player's turn: Remove 1 token from the Sol player's strategy pool, if able, and return it to their reinforcements. Then, you may place 2 infantry from your reinforcements on any planet you control. Then, return this card to the Sol player.

name: Creuss Iff
text: At the start of your turn during the action phase: Place or move a Creuss wormhole token into either a system that contains a planet you control or a non-home system that does not contain another player's ships. Then, return this card to the Creuss player.

name: Cybernetic Enhancements
text: When you gain command tokens during the status phase: Gain 1 additional command token. Then, return this card to the L1Z1X player.

name: Scepter of Dominion
text: At the start of the strategy phase: Choose 1 non-home system that contains your units, each other player who has a token on the Mahact player's command sheet places a token from their reinforcements in that system. Then, return this card to the Mahact player.

name: Promise of Protection
text: Action: Place this card faceup in your play area. While this card is in your play area, the Mentak player cannot use their Pillage faction ability against you. If you activate a system that contains 1 or more of the Mentak player's units, return this card to the Mentak player.

name: Gift of Prescience
text: At the end of the Strategy Phase: Place this card faceup in your play area and place the Naalu '0' token on your strategy card, you are the first in initiative order. The Naalu player cannot use his Telepathic faction ability during this game round. Return this card to the Naalu player at the end of the status phase.

name: Black Market Forgery
text: Action: Purge 2 of your relic fragments of the same type to gain 1 relic. Then, return this card to the Naaz-Rokha player.

name: Antivirus
text: At the start of a combat: Place this card faceup in your play area. While this card is in your play area, the Nekro player cannot use their Technological Singularity faction ability against you. If you activate a system that contains 1 or more of the Nekro player's units, return this card to the Nekro player.

name: The Cavalry
text: At the start of a space combat against a player other than the Nomad: During this combat, treat 1 of your non-fighter ships as if it has the Sustain Damage ability, combat value, and Anti-Fighter Barrage value of the Nomad's flagship. Return this card to the Nomad player at the end of the combat.

name: Tekklar Legion
text: At the start of an invasion combat: Apply +1 to the result of each of your unit's combat rolls during this combat. If your opponent is the N'orr player, apply -1 to the result of each of their unit's combat rolls during this combat. Then, return this card to the N'orr player.

name: Terraform
text: Action: Attach this card to a non-home planet you control other than Mecatol Rex. Its resource and influence values are each increased by 1, and it is treated as having all 3 planet traits (cultural, hazardous, and industrial).

name: Research Agreement
text: After the Jol-Nar player researches a technology that is not a faction technology: Gain that technology. Then, return this card to the Jol-Nar player.

name: Crucible
text: After you activate a system: Your ships do not roll for gravity rifts during this movement, apply an additional +1 to the move values of your ships that would move out of or through a gravity rift instead. Then, return this card to the Vuil'raith player.

name: Acquiescence
text: When the Winnu player resolves a strategic action: You do not have to spend or place a command token to resolve the secondary ability of that strategy card. Then, return this card to the Winnu player.

name: Political Favor
text: When an agenda is revealed: Remove 1 token from the Xxcha player's strategy pool and return it to their reinforcements. Then, discard the revealed agenda and reveal 1 agenda from the top of the deck. Players vote on this agenda instead. Then, return this card to the Xxcha player.

name: Greyfire Mutagen
text: At the start of a ground combat against 2 or more ground forces that are not controlled by the Yin player: Replace 1 of your opponent's infantry with 1 infantry from your reinforcements. Then, return this card to the Yin player.

name: Spy Net
text: At the start of your turn: Look at the Yssaril player's hand of action cards. Choose 1 of those cards and add it to your hand. Then, return this card to the Yssaril player.

name: Stymie
text: After another player moves ships into a system that contains 1 or more of your units: You may place 1 command token from that player's reinforcements in any non-home system. Then, return this card to the Arborec player.

name: Dark Pact
text: Action: Place this card faceup in your play area. When you give a number of commodities to the Empyrean player equal to your maximum commodity value, you each gain 1 trade good. If you activate a system that contains 1 or more of the Empyrean player's units, return this card to the Empyrean player.

name: Keleres Rider
text: After an agenda is revealed: You cannot vote on this agenda. Predict aloud an outcome of this agenda. If your prediction is correct, draw 1 action card and gain 2 trade goods. Then, return this card to the Keleres player.

name: Keleres Rider
text: After an agenda is revealed: You cannot vote on this agenda. Predict aloud an outcome of this agenda. If your prediction is correct, draw 1 action card and gain 2 trade goods. Then, return this card to the Keleres player.

name: Keleres Rider
text: After an agenda is revealed: You cannot vote on this agenda. Predict aloud an outcome of this agenda. If your prediction is correct, draw 1 action card and gain 2 trade goods. Then, return this card to the Keleres player.

name: Keleres Rider
text: After an agenda is revealed: You cannot vote on this agenda. Predict aloud an outcome of this agenda. If your prediction is correct, draw 1 action card and gain 2 trade goods. Then, return this card to the Keleres player.

name: Mass Transference
text: Action: move one of your structures to another eligible area that contains one or more of your units and place a command token from you reinforcements in that system. Then, return this card to the Admins player.

name: Read the Fates
text: ACTION: Place this face up in your play area.While this card is in your play area, you may look at the public objective card on the Ilyxum player's faction sheet.If you activate a system that contains 1 or more of the Ilyxum player's units, return this card to the Ilyxum player.

name: Industry Secrets
text: When 1 or more of your units use PRODUCTION:Place this card face up in your play area to apply +4 to the PRODUCTION value of those units and reduce the combined cost of the produced units by 1 for this use of PRODUCTION.At the beginning of the status phase, return this card to the Axis player.

name: Encryption Key
text: ACTION: Attach this card to a non-home planet you control.This planet has 1 technology specialty of any color.

name: Shared Misery
text: At the start of a ground combat against a player other than the Blex player: Apply -1 to the result of each of your opponent's unit's combat rolls during this combat.Then, return this card to the Blex player.

name: Trade Alliance
text: When you receive this card, if you are not the Celdauri player, you must place it face up in your play area.While this card is in your play area, you can use the Celdauri player's commander ability, if it is unlocked.If you activate a system that contains 1 or more of the Celdauri player's units, return this card to the Celdauri player.

name: Carcinisation
text: When 1 of your non-fighter ships is destroyed during combat: You may place 2 fighters from your reinforcements in the space area of the active system.At the end of that combat, return this card to the Cheiran Hordes player.

name: Algorithmic Replication
text: ACTION: Choose 1 action card from the action card discard pile and add it to your hand.Then, purge this card.

name: Combat Drills
text: When 1 of your ships would be destroyed: Instead of destroying that ship, place this card face up in your play area.Return this card to the Dih-Mohn player at the start of the status phase.

name: Edyn Diplomatic Support
text: When you receive this card, if you are not the Edyn player, place this card face-up in your play area. While this card is in your play area and you have your Support for the Throne, you have 1 additional victory point.If you activate a system that contains 1 or more of the Edyn player's units, return this card to the Edyn player.

name: Underground Market
text: When you would gain a relic:You may draw 1 additional card.  Choose 1 to gain and return the rest to the relic deck. Then, shuffle the relic deck.Then, return this card to the Florzen player.

name: Broadcast Teams
text: When you gain control of a planet during a tactical action:If the active system does not contain another player's ships, you may produce up to 2 ships in that system.Then, return this card to the Free Systems player.

name: Raid Leaders
text: After you activate a system:Choose 1 non-fighter ship you control.  During this action, that unit gains BOMBARDMENT 5(x2) and a capacity value of 2.Return this card to the Ghemina player at the end of this action.

name: Ghoti Relay
text: At the start of your turn:Place this card in your play area to produce up to 2 ships in a system that contains 1 or more of your ships.At the start of the status phase, return this card to the Ghoti Player.

name: Gledge Base
text: ACTION: Attach this card to a non-home planet you control.This planet's resource value is increased by 2.

name: Stone Speakers
text: During a tactical action, when you produce 1 or more hits during a BOMBARDMENT roll:For each hit you produced, you may instead place 1 infantry from your reinforcements on the planet being bombarded.Then, return this card to the L'tokk Khrask player.

name: Vassalage
text: At the start of combat:Apply +1 to the results of each of your fighters' combat rolls during this combat. The Kjalengard player captures each of your fighters destroyed during this combat.Then, return this card to the Kjalengard player.

name: AI Survey
text: At the start of your turn:You may look at either the top card of the cultural, hazardous, and industrial exploration decks, or the top card of the relic deck.Then, return this card to the Kollecc player.

name: Combinatorial Bypass
text: At the start of invasion, place this card in your play area.During this invasion, all other player's units lose SPACE CANNON and PLANETARY SHIELD.At the start of your next turn, return this card to the Kolume player.

name: Blessing of the Queens
text: ACTION: Place this card face up in your play area and remove 1 of your command tokens from the game board.At the start of the status phase, return this card to the Kortali player.

name: Kyro Rider
text: After an agenda is revealed: You cannot vote on this agenda. Predict aloud an outcome of this agenda. If your prediction is correct, place 3 infantry from your reinforcements on a planet you control. Then, return this card to the Kyro player.

name: Spoils of War
text: After you win a combat: Place this card face-up in your play area to explore 1 planet you control.At the start of the Lanefir player's turn, return this card to the Lanefir player.

name: Trusted Counselor
text: At the start of a space combat you are participating in:You may place up to 2 fighters from your reinforcements into the space area of the active system.Then, return this card to the Li-Zho player.

name: Rapid Assembly
text: At the start of your turn:You may move up to 2 PDS units you control to a planet you control. Then, return this card to the Mirveda player.

name: Secrets of the Weave
text: At the start of a space combat:Choose 1 of your opponent's ships in the active system, you may produce 1 unit of that type in that system, spending influence instead of resources.Then, return this card to the Mortheus player.

name: Gift of Insight
text: ACTION: Place this card face up in your play area.While this card is in your play area, once per turn, after you roll a die, you may reroll that die.If you activate a system that contains 1 or more of the Myko-Mentori player's units, return this card to the Myko-Mentori player.

name: Nivyn Guidance
text: After you activate a system:During this activation, you may ignore the effects of each anomaly.Return this card to the Nivyn player at the end of this activation.

name: Nokar Navigator
text: At the start of a space combat:During this combat, the active system is adjacent to each system that contains a planet you control for the purposes of announcing and resolving retreats.At the end of this combat, return this card to the Nokar player.

name: Incite Revolution
text: ACTION: Place this card face up in your play area to choose and exhaust 1 planet you control. Then, ready 1 non-home planet you control other than Mecatol Rex.At the start of the status phase, return this card to the Olradin player.

name: Automatons
text: At the end of your turn, you may attach this card to a non-home planet you control other than Mecatol Rex. This planet has PRODUCTION 3 as if it were a unit.

name: Plots Within Plots
text: When you draw 1 or more secret objective cards: Draw 1 additional secret objective card. Then, return 1 secret objective card to the secret objective deck.  Shuffle that deck. Then, return this card to the Tnelis player.

name: Vaden Handshake
text: After you activate a system:You may spend any number of trade goods. For each trade good spent, apply +1 to the move value of 1 non-fighter ship you control during this activation.Return this card to the Vaden player at the end of this activation.

name: Clan's Favor
text: At the start of a round of space combat:The Vaylerian player discards 1 action card. Then, move all of your ships from the active system to an adjacent system that does not contain another player's ships.  The space combat ends in a draw.Then, place a command token from your reinforcements in that system and return this card to the Vaylerian player.

name: Branch Office - Tax Haven
text: When you receive this card, you must attach it to a non-home planet you control other than Mecatol Rex that does not have a Branch Office attachment. Its influence value is increased by 1.

name: Branch Office - Broadcast Hub
text: When you receive this card, you must attach it to a non-home planet you control other than Mecatol Rex that does not have a Branch Office attachment. Its influence value is increased by 1.

name: Branch Office - Reserve Bank
text: When you receive this card, you must attach it to a non-home planet you control other than Mecatol Rex that does not have a Branch Office attachment. Its resource value is increased by 1.

name: Branch Office - Orbital Shipyard
text: When you receive this card, you must attach it to a non-home planet you control other than Mecatol Rex that does not have a Branch Office attachment. Its resource value is increased by 1.

name: Favor of Rhodun
text: When you ignore a prerequisite on a technology card you are researching: You may ignore 1 additional prerequisite of the same color.Then, return this card to the Rhodun player.

name: Hyperkinetic Ordinance
text: When 1 or more of your units would make a BOMBARDMENT roll:If you produce 1 or more hits during this BOMBARDMENT roll, produce 1 additional hit for that roll.Then, return this card to the Zelian player.

name: Absol's Political Secret
text: When you cast votes: You may exhaust up to 3 of the purple player's planets and cast additional votes equal to the combined influence value of the exhausted planets. Then return this card to the purple player.

name: Absol's Political Secret
text: When you cast votes: You may exhaust up to 3 of the pink player's planets and cast additional votes equal to the combined influence value of the exhausted planets. Then return this card to the pink player.

text: When you cast votes: You may exhaust up to 3 of the blue player's planets and cast additional votes equal to the combined influence value of the exhausted planets. Then return this card to the blue player.

text: When you cast votes: You may exhaust up to 3 of the bloodred player's planets and cast additional votes equal to the combined influence value of the exhausted planets. Then return this card to the bloodred player.
